mapper.sql: id, live_id liveId, start_time startTime, ent_time endTime, create_time createTime, last_revamp_time lastRevampTime
mapper.update: UPDATE base_live_time SET live_id = #{liveId}, ent_time = #{endTime},last_revamp_time=#{lastRevampTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE base_live_time SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE base_live_time SET del_flag = 1 WHERE live_id = #{liveId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.live_id liveId, t.start_time startTime, t.ent_time endTime, t.create_time, t.last_revamp_time lastRevampTime FROM `base_live_time` t left join `base_live` l on t.live_id = l.id where l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time desc limit 1
